subject: Fencing (Sport)
Olympic Games
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Mangiarotti, of Italy, won more Olympic medals and world championships than any fencer in the history of the sport, starting with the Berlin Games in 1936.
snippet: Mr. Mangiarotti, of Italy, won more Olympic medals and world championships than any fencer in the history of the sport, starting with the Berlin Games in 1936.
